# fugle-express

## How to use

1. Clone the repository by `git clone`
2. Run `npm i` to get all the necessary modules
3. Create a file `.env`, and refer to `example.env` to input the necessary environment variables

## API Response Format

1. HTTP API

- Response example:

```shell=
{"result":[35267707,35269304,35265752,35264725,35268050,35267901,35263285,35266322,35263886,35263799,35264487,35260815,35259527,35269659,35268197,35258877,35246995,35267692,35260401,35266553,35261065,35263635,35270175,35266304,35263542,35261363,35269347,35261386,35262131,35268697,35266054,35263115,35260931,35265665,35260392,35268746,35269811,35243981,35262866,35267627,35264965,35259214,35266170,35261043,35256769,35259588,35267944,35248098,35256014,35264229,35265376,35264847,35268147,35246139,35246292,35266488,35256178,35268425,35266933,35268555,35236414,35257416,35258553,35269461,35269590,35256288,35258323,35253710,35266774,35263838,35266919,35259817,35267407,35264204,35267313,35268181,35266219,35246253,35259428,35264780,35236275,35268145,35259595,35260322,35265587,35255052,35239972,35267569,35254716,35264055,35266151,35246710,35247557,35242193,35256237,35266256,35247242,35253753,35262156,35265530,35267485,35261963,35267914,35254389,35263804,35263740,35264035,35246573,35255864,35259897,35265027,35258950,35261301,35258099,35267328,35265712,35266697,35265549,35264273,35248912,35242299,35254576,35253362,35252416,35263388,35240962,35262073,35266124,35264674,35259315,35266900,35265882,35269805,35265138,35248296,35264343,35252618,35268053,35264781,35242608,35266358,35264787,35249971,35245008,35265299,35265276,35246228,35237787,35264418,35259233,35247299,35253962,35252223,35266271,35242662,35235952,35264742,35243752,35252637,35262333,35244620,35260210,35241212,35252144,35236272,35254997,35258691,35252156,35255354,35242069,35267010,35257278,35248975,35270234,35239993,35258584,35240951,35243435,35255519,35267676,35262629,35263842,35237269,35245626,35265042,35238906,35262413,35252837,35257113,35266323,35237646,35257349,35242458,35256867,35241608,35249317,35247462,35253088,35253821,35255618,35263969,35263908,35263903,35264648,35258441,35263860,35240431,35238876,35248517,35259737,35257297,35238888,35250873,35248977,35256049,35238822,35265014,35253574,35261555,35264894,35257039, ```
```

2. Rate Limiter

- Response Example (When too many requests):

```shell=
{ ip: 5, id: 5 }
```

3. WebSocket 1 minute OHLC

- Response Example:

```shell=
{"pair":"btceur","ohlc":{"open":25161,"high":25161,"low":25161,"close":25161,"lastUpdated":27992350}}
{"pair":"btcusd","ohlc":{"open":27423,"high":27425,"low":27423,"close":27425,"lastUpdated":27992350}}
{"pair":"btcgbp","ohlc":{"open":22258,"high":22258,"low":22258,"close":22258,"lastUpdated":27992350}}
{"pair":"btcusd","ohlc":{"open":27423,"high":27423,"low":27423,"close":27423,"lastUpdated":27992350}}
```
